Text:
eagerly waiting for no 8

sigh..guess its really gonna take 10 years for the comic to even catch up to book no 5 aye?

the tv series is slow enough as it is..but with good visual effects

guess the comics will be for nostalgia sake and those hunger for more details..lol
Could you post issue 8 of this and the others as they subsequently come out as it doesn't look like anyone else will be? Please and thanks! :) keep up the work! I truly appreciate it! :)
